rushed.translation[0].definitions[0].def: done very quickly or too quickly, because there was not enough time
rushed.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: We did have a meeting, but it was a bit rushed.
rushed.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if you are rushed, you are very busy because you have a lot of things to do quickly
rushed.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I’ll talk to you later – I’m a bit rushed at the moment.
I’ve been rushed off my feet (=extremely busy) all day.
